bug.author: reyoung
bug.summary: The protobuf 3.1.0 cause a warning in MacOS building
bug.description: The Protobuf's issue is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/google/protobuf/issues/2182>here</denchmark-link> . Because Paddle treats all warnings as errors, so it will cause Paddle building failed in MacOS. Maybe we should upgrade Paddle's protobuf to 3.2.0.

comments.comment: Close it since not activate. Feel free to reopen it.
